page.title: 07INDUSTRY
page.content: { EMPLOYMENT,WORK, INDUSTRIAL ESTATES {(BERRY HILL) We visited 8 units on the estate.These were,Salvesens(Frozen Food Transporters,379 Employees).Gloenco (Manufacturers of Plastics Machines,150 Employees).Sommer Alibert(Plastic goods suppliers,250 Employees).Kays Co.(Mail order firm, 110 Employees).Evertons of Ombersley, (Transportation of wines and spirits, 8 employees).Inductotherm(Furnace manufacturers,180 Employees).Ofrex (Stationary Supplies,25 employees). Peterson Publishing(Leisure Reading Publishers,150 Employees).We found most of the firms had branches elsewhere in the U.K. and chose Droitwich so that they had a base in the Midlands,within easy access of the M.5.The companies had been established in Droitwich for between 10-20 years.
